A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed the movie. There was a lot going on in it. I did like how they went back and told us what happened with Luke's apprentices. I enjoyed the fight sceens very much. I wished they wouldn't of thrown away Snoke. Who is he? What is he? I get where they are going with this but they could of touched a little more on some characters. I am glad certain ones did not die right away. I was also very pleased to see some old faces return and in a very fitting manner. Overall\, I enjoyed it. I can't wait to see where they take this in a galaxy so very far away.
